div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: title: Recommendation 0.1: Preoperative screening of delirium

blockquote.p: currentState: Published final form (Cited Artifact Status Type#published-final-form)

tr.td: English (Tags for the Identification of Languages#en)
Delirium should be screened in patients before surgery.

td.a: Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients

tr.td: Clinical practice guideline recommendation (CEOsys Code System#guideline-recommendation)
